Html:
My development environment is W2K3 Server & Sql2005Ent. However, the client's db is Sql2000. So, i need to backup and restore the my DB to client's machine.

Well, since these seems not possible; only some suggestions for export & import data's etc., but my concern is, will there be primary & foreign keys problem, if I do it this way.

Or is there any other way to move the database?

I may try the Sql2000 scripts for CSK, however, i made lots of changes to the DB. And also, if I try to script my db to Sql2000 compatible mode, i give lots of errors (asp.net memberships related). Are there any ways to correct this?

Thanks,
If you have VS standard or pro, you can use the SQL Publish to Hoster that will generate the SQL 2000/2005 scripts for you.
